details.attached-pkm-not-found:
Pkm not found in attached save.
If expected consider detach from save.
Otherwise check the save integrity.
details.is-duplicate: Copies of this pkm exists in save, "move attached" action won't be available.
details.is-disabled: This PKM is disabled, available actions are restricted to minimum.

storage.move.save-egg: Eggs cannot be moved outside save
storage.move.save-shadow: Shadow pkm cannot be moved outside save

storage.bank.edit.view.help: Bank should be selected before updating view
storage.bank.delete.help: Bank should be empty (no pkm) before delete it
storage.box.delete.help: Box should be empty, and not last one before delete it
storage.sort.description.1: Pkms in box range will be sorted by species, starting from Bulbasaur (#1).
storage.sort.description.2: If you leave empty slots for missing species, process may fail if missing space.
storage.sort.description.3: If you leave empty slots for missing species, boxes may be created in the process if missing space.
storage.dex-sync.title: Select multiple Pokedex to sync
storage.dex-sync.description: Pokedex of each selection will share its data, in both ways.
storage.actions.unsafe:
Warning: this action can be unsafe.
After use check your save integrity, on any issue you can restore a backup.
storage.actions.move-attached-main.helpT: Move a linked copy of this pkm to the save
storage.actions.move-attached-main.helpC:
Move a copy to save, attached to stored pkm.
An attached pkm synchronizes its data from save with source stored pkm: exp, level, EVs, moves, nickname.
This allows to use the same pkm later in another save even if it's not the same generation
storage.actions.move-attached-save.helpT: Move a linked copy of this pkm to the storage
storage.actions.move-attached-save.helpC:
Move a copy to storage, attached to save pkm.
An attached pkm synchronizes its data from save with source stored pkm: exp, level, EVs, moves, nickname.
This allows to use the same pkm later in another save even if it's not the same generation
storage.actions.create-variant.helpTitle: Create a variant of this pkm for the generation {{generation}}
storage.actions.create-variant.helpConte:
Create a copy compatible with save.
It allows to use pkm which may be not-compatible with any generation.
All variants shares same exp, level, EVs, but each one handles its own moves.
storage.actions.go-main.helpTitle: An attached variant is present in a save
storage.actions.go-save.helpTitle: An attached variant is present in stockage
storage.actions.detach-main.helpTitle: Detach pkm from attached one in save
storage.actions.detach-main.helpContent:
Break link between this pkm and the one in save (if exists).
Allows to use pkm in another save, and create new variants.
storage.actions.detach-save.helpTitle: Detach pkm from attached one in storage
storage.actions.detach-save.helpContent:
Break link between this pkm and the one in storage.
Allows to use pkm in another save, and create new variants.
details.stats.name: Stats
storage.save-actions.title: {{count}} actions to save
storage.save-actions.help: Don't forget to save your changes !
storage.save-actions.type.create-pkm-var: Create variant for pkm {{name}} and generation {{generation}}
